basic_information.scholarship_name: Dr. Joann McCarthy Endowed Scholarship in Educational Leadership
basic_information.committee_name: CEPS - Dr. Joann McCarthy Endowed Scholarship
basic_information.college_name: College of Education and Professional Studies

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are majoring in Educational Leadership. Eligibility Requirements Any student pursuing their graduate degree in Educational Leadership 3.0 GPA or higher Must be currently certified as an Oklahoma teacher or counselor Nationally Board certified preferred but not required Must be currently working as an Oklahoma teacher or counselor with a family to support Must demonstrate through a personal statement a desire to continue working in the Oklahoma Public School System Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
